title: Postseason Non-Game Events (NGE) Ticket Links - TicketsTab > BuyTickets
custom_preconds:
[BP-10351](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10351 ) / [BP-10391](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10391 )
[BPA-7117](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7117 ) / [BPA-7241](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7241 )

GIVEN Postseason game events (as NGEs) are configured to be listed from Ticketing/Scheduling Team
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to Tickets Tab
AND User navigates to Buy Tickets view
AND user selects a club configured for Postseason NGE
custom_expected:
THEN User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed in 'Other' section (below final month - October, or September in some cases)
AND User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed w/ dates NOT shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User navigates to Tickets Tab
AND User navigates to Buy Tickets view
AND user selects a club configured for Postseason NGE 
AND user selects Home Games for the schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display NonGameEvents as placeholder entries in Other section w/ the team's venue name listed (Wild Card Home Games, Division Home Games, League Home Games) 
AND User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed w/ dates NOT shown (as they are TBD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps postseason NGE entry containing T-Link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to webview to page to purchase the event at the specified venue

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User navigates to Tickets Tab
AND User navigates to Buy Tickets view
AND user selects a club configured for Postseason NGE 
AND user selects Full Schedule for the schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display NonGameEvents as placeholder entries in Other section w/ the team's venue name listed (Wild Card Home Games, Division Home Games, League Home Games) 
AND User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed w/ dates NOT shown (as they are TBD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps postseason NGE entry containing T-Link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to webview to page to purchase the event at the specified venue

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User navigates to Tickets Tab
AND User navigates to Buy Tickets view
AND user selects a club configured NOT for Postseason NGE 
AND user selects Home Games for the schedule

(can also validate Full Schedule)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will NOT display Other section
AND the app will NOT display NonGameEvents as placeholder entries

title: Postseason Non-Game Events (NGE) Ticket Links - Team > Schedule
custom_preconds:
[BP-10351](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10351 ) / [BP-10391](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10391 )
[BPA-7117](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7117 ) / [BPA-7241](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7241 )

GIVEN Postseason game events (as NGEs) are configured to be listed from Ticketing/Scheduling Team
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to Team Tab 
AND user selects a club configured for Postseason NGE 
AND user navigates to Schedule view
custom_expected:
THEN User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed in 'Other' section (below final month - October, or September in some cases)
AND User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed w/ dates NOT shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User navigates to Team Tab 
AND user selects a club configured for Postseason NGE 
AND user navigates to Schedule view
AND user selects Home Games for the schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display NonGameEvents as placeholder entries in Other section w/ the team's venue name listed (Wild Card Home Games, Division Home Games, League Home Games) 
AND User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed w/ dates NOT shown (as they are TBD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps postseason NGE entry containing T-Link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to webview to page to purchase the event at the specified venue

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User navigates to Team Tab 
AND user selects a club configured for Postseason NGE 
AND user navigates to Schedule view
AND user selects Full Schedule for the schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display NonGameEvents as placeholder entries in Other section w/ the team's venue name listed (Wild Card Home Games, Division Home Games, League Home Games) 
AND User is shown Postseason NGE events displayed w/ dates NOT shown (as they are TBD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps postseason NGE entry containing T-Link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to webview to page to purchase the event at the specified venue

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User navigates to Team Tab 
AND user selects a club NOT configured for Postseason NGE 
AND user navigates to Schedule view
AND user selects Home Games for the schedule

(can also validate Full Schedule)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will NOT display Other section
AND the app will NOT display NonGameEvents as placeholder entries

title: Confirm Ticket Display in Wallet Tab for Post-Season game
custom_preconds:
Given:
User has ticket for post season game
custom_steps:
When:
User navigates to Wallet Tab
custom_expected:
Then:
User sees card in Wallet Tab for that game

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the Wallet Tab
And Tickets are returned
And Ticket is for a post season game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the following details of the game in card view:
Date and Time TBD if unknown
Name of the event
Venue: Orioles Park (use string from boxoffice "venueName")
Background: venue poster background

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the View All Button on Wallet Tab
And list of tickets is presented
And Ticket is for a post season game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN status bar displays "My Tickets" with back arrow

[IF DATE IS ESTABLISHED]
THEN the section header displays "October"
AND each row entry displays:
   "Thu 26" (day of week followed by calendar day number)
   Post season event name
   Time: in hh:mm am TZ format or "Date and Time TBD"
   Venue: American Family Field (use string from boxoffice "venueName")


[IF DATE NOT YET BEEN ESTABLISHED]
THEN the section header displays "Other" (possibly below the other months, if events are available)
AND each row entry displays:
   Post season event name
   Venue: American Family Field (use string from boxoffice "venueName")

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the "View"(or 'Open Tickets') button of a row in the Wallet list view
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the ticket list view is presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the card on Wallet Tab
And list of tickets is presented
And Ticket is for a post season game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the list title bar displays "Tickets"
Then the list header includes:
Post-season event name
Next line displays the time of the game presented in Fri, Sep 27 * hh:MM AM TZ format or "Date and Time TBD"
Next line is venue name

Then list rows consist of:
Sec / Row / Seat header with values (or parking info)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on "Open" link in Ticket List for a ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the ticket scan view is presented

title: Confirm Ticket Display in Scan View for Post-Season game
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has purchased a post-season ticket
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Scanview for the post season event
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the Ticket Scan view with the following details of the event: (Post Season)

Date, Time: date & time (as supplied in display summary)
Name of post season NGE
Venue: venue supplied in display summary
Bar code & Animated baseball: Barcode/icon is displayed when available, otherwise text providing information
Background: default blue color 
Sec/Row/Seat: correct info is displayed
Additional extended info: displayed and matches what was supplied
Ticket Holder: name displayed
Ticket Number: number displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When "i" icon is clicked
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then back of ticket is displayed

title: Confirm Ticket Display in Home Tab for Post-Season game
custom_preconds: Given that user has purchased a post-season ticket
custom_steps: When user navigates to Home Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the following details of the game in card view:

Name of the event
Time: in hh:mm am TZ format or description provided in display summary
Venue: Orioles Park (use string from boxoffice "venueName")
Background: Background poster
"Open Tickets" button displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When "Open Tickets" button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Scan View is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When Next-Ticketed Event Card is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then List View is displayed

title: Confirm Sent Ticket Forwarding for Post-Season Tickets
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has post-season ticket
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "forward" option
custom_expected: THEN ticket is successfully forwarded and appears correct in Ticket Forward History

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on "forward" option for non-TBD date & time ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN ticket is successfully forwarded
AND appears correctly in Ticket Forward Sent List

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user who received non-TBD ticket views ticket in Received list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN ticket is appears correct in Ticket Forward Received

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on "forward" option for TBD date & time ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN ticket is successfully forwarded
AND appears correctly in Ticket Forward Sent List

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user who received TBD ticket views ticket in Received list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN ticket is appears correct in Ticket Forward Received

title: Confirm Revoking Ticket Forward for Post-Season Ticket
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has forwarded a post season ticket
custom_steps: WHEN User revokes forward of post season ticket
custom_expected: THEN Ticket forward is successfully revoked

title: Confirm Received Ticket Forwarding History display
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has received a forwarded a post-season ticket
custom_steps: WHEN user views ticket forwarding history
custom_expected: THEN received forwarded ticket is displayed with proper info

title: Confirm Team Tab Checkin for Post-Season games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur
AND the user is on Team Tab 
AND theselected team has a post-season game

Note to complete a manual check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time (can be mocked)

NOTE: TeamTab Check-in feature is ticket agnostic, meaning that expected behavior should be verified both with AND without tickets
(if using the same account to verify with and without tickets, ensure that the event check-in has been removed/deleted, prior to repeating validation)
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on checkin button on the Team Tab of the home venue club
custom_expected: THEN user is able to successfully checkin to post-season game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user open the app to Team Page
AND the user taps on 'Check In' button at the bottom
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is presented Check-in modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes the team tab check-in (adding details, seat info, and photo)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been checked-in to the event on the Team Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with details inputted in prev step.
AND user has capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

title: Confirm Checkin Unlocked Offers from Team Tab for Post-Season
custom_preconds: GIVEN user's current team has a post season game with an offer attached to the checkin
custom_steps: WHEN user successfully completes checkin
custom_expected:
THEN user is able to successfully unlock available offers
AND Unlock offers button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes a team tab check-in with an offer attached
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN unlocked offer indicator shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user proceeds to My Offers page (within TicketsTab)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown the unlocked offers

title: Confirm Wallet Transitions from TBD to Actual values for Post-Season Tickets
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a post-season ticket where at least one field is TBD
custom_steps: WHEN TBD field has been determined and user refreshes Wallet view
custom_expected: THEN TBD is no longer show but actual value

title: Confirm Scan View Transitions from TBD to Actual Values for Post Season Tickets
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a post-season ticket where at least one field is TBD
custom_steps:
WHEN TBD field has been determined and user refreshes Wallet view
AND goes to scan view
custom_expected: THEN TBD is no longer shown but actual value

title: Confirm Home (Next Ticketed Event) Transitions from TBD to Actual values for Post-Season Tickets
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a post-season ticket where at least one field is TBD
custom_steps: WHEN TBD field has been determined and user refreshes Home view
custom_expected: THEN TBD is no longer show but actual value

title: Confirm Home (Next Ticketed Event) Transitions from 'If Necessary' to Actual values for Post-Season Tickets
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a post-season ticket where the game is flagged as 'If Necessary'
custom_steps: WHEN 'if necessary' field has been removed (set to false) and user refreshes Home view
custom_expected: THEN if necessary'  is no longer shown

title: Confirm Ticket Forwarding Transitions from TBD to Actual values for Post-Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a post-season ticket where at least one field is TBD
AND User forwards the ticket
custom_steps: WHEN TBD field has been determined and user views the ticket forward history
custom_expected: THEN TBD is no longer shown but actual value

title: Confirm Home Tab Checkin (auto-checkin) for Post-Season game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time (can be mocked)

NOTE: Auto Check-in feature is ticket agnostic, meaning that expected behavior should be verified both with AND without tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
custom_expected: THEN the user should be automatically checked-in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
AND the user does NOT have tickets for the event intended to check-in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

custom_steps_separated.content: (note: if using the same account to verify with and without tickets, ensure that the event check-in has been removed/deleted, prior to proceeding)

WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
AND the user has tickets for the event intended to check-in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

title: Upcoming Section Shown - Eligibility Met
custom_preconds:
Requirements for Section/Cards shown (as of June 2021)
* location enabled (passed from BP to Home Service)
* available T-link for upcoming games (within 30 days)
* stadium location is within 60 miles of device location


GIVEN Ballpark app is installed (10.3.0 or greater)
AND user in logged into BP
custom_steps: WHEN all the eligibility requirements are met
custom_expected:
THEN Home Tab will display 'Upcoming Games' section with relevant matchup cards, providing a personalized experience

Display:
* In section “Upcoming”
* Reason for recommending string e.g. “Near You”
* Away logo overlaid on away primary, home logo over home primary
 ** No NGE support for v1
* Matchup string (e.g. Away team name vs Home team name)
* Date and time string (Mon, Apr 26 • 7:00 PM ET)
* Venue name string

mock: https://app.zeplin.io/project/602160fce3c37f64b50c8127/screen/60ac0eae82aeac2798344b41

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user's device location is enabled (and passing data from BP to Home Service)
AND an available T-link for upcoming games (within 30 days)
AND stadium location is within 60 miles of device location
AND the user is on the Home tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see an upcoming game matchup with a call to action to buy tickets

Display:
* In section “Upcoming Games”
* Reason for recommending string e.g. “Near You”
* Away logo overlaid on away primary, home logo over home primary
 ** No NGE support for v1
* Matchup string (e.g. Away team name vs Home team name)
* Date and time string (Mon, Apr 26 • 7:00 PM ET)
* Venue name string

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user tap's on the call to action to buy tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be taken to a purchase webview for the upsell game
